verses.plain: Blessed is every one that feareth the LORD; that walketh in his ways.
For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.

tokens.t: For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy

verses.plain: Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.

tokens.t: as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.

verses.plain: Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the LORD.

tokens.t: Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the

verses.plain: The LORD shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.

tokens.t: shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.

verses.plain: Yea, thou shalt see thy children’s children, and peace upon Israel.

tokens.t: Yea, thou shalt see thy children’s children,
